title: Flush - Crowdsourced Toilets
summary: A public toilet and restroom/WC/bathroom finder/locator
developerAddress:
66 Main Street
Rotherham
S62 7TN
United Kingdom
description: Flush is a fast and simple toilet finder. It has a slick interface with beautiful animations and transitions inspired by material design. The database of tens of thousands of public toilets is stored on the phone for fast and offline access! Search for a location as well as pan on the map and we'll show you the nearest public toilets to you. Tap on the map to get directions provided by Google Maps. Or if you just really need to find a toilet, tap the directions button and we'll give you directions to the closest toilet, no need to fiddle about with anything. The database is constantly expanding and we'll tell you whether there is a fee, whether you require a key and whether or not they provide disabled access if we know it.Features:. Find public restrooms/toilets quickly and easily. Locate toilets anywhere around the world, wherever you are. A database of over 200,000 toilets available, constantly being increased. A beautiful material design inspired interface. A quick directions button, to get you directions to a toilet as quickly as possible. Find whether a toilet has a fee, requires a key or provides disabled/accessibility access. Works perfectly offline, no internet connection required to find a toilet
descriptionHTML:
Flush is a fast and simple toilet finder. It has a slick interface with beautiful animations and transitions inspired by material design. The database of tens of thousands of public toilets is stored on the phone for fast and offline access! Search for a location as well as pan on the map and we'll show you the nearest public toilets to you. Tap on the map to get directions provided by Google Maps. Or if you just really need to find a toilet, tap the directions button and we'll give you directions to the closest toilet, no need to fiddle about with anything. The database is constantly expanding and we'll tell you whether there is a fee, whether you require a key and whether or not they provide disabled access if we know it.

Features:
. Find public restrooms/toilets quickly and easily
. Locate toilets anywhere around the world, wherever you are
. A database of over 200,000 toilets available, constantly being increased
. A beautiful material design inspired interface
. A quick directions button, to get you directions to a toilet as quickly as possible
. Find whether a toilet has a fee, requires a key or provides disabled/accessibility access
. Works perfectly offline, no internet connection required to find a toilet
comments: This app save me from having a disaster. Night before I had a extra large donner kebab with extra hot chilli sauce I had chilli sauce on chips and chilli sauce on the salad the next morning I was ok, I was pottering in the town centre the next minute I needed the toilet desperately I've got this app out and boom Saved me
I am hesitating to rate wether or not this app deserves a five star. It would be nice if we could rate the toilets. Who are reviewing the reports?
This app sucks. All the pics of the locations are inaccurate. Most of the places listed are for customers only. Good idea for an app but very poorly executed.
Useless! It shows random houses as available public restrooms. What a joke!
Why did you make it all white? You used to have good designs
Really useful application. Especially in New York City
